subject: Public Speaking
title: Becoming a Story Collector
description: A micro-lesson that makes Becoming a Story Collector usable.

hook.text: Great storytellers collect stories like others collect art.

buildup.text: Carry a notebook. Record every interesting moment.

discovery.text: Tag stories by theme: courage, failure, connection, surprise.

twist.text: A rich story library means you always have the perfect story.

climax.text: Collecting stories becomes a life practice, not just a career tool.

punchline.text: Collect stories obsessively. They're your arsenal.

quiz.question: How do you build a story library?
options: Record and tag interesting moments daily
